table.name: lrg_location_join
table.description: This table will be used as a join between location resource group and location.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: LOCATION_RESOURCE_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the location resource group. Option here is to link a calendar and preference level for a location resource group.

columns.name: LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the location. Option here is to link a calendar and preference level for a location resource group for this location.

columns.name: CALENDAR_GID
columns.description: The calendar GID that will be applied to the location of the location resource group.

columns.name: PREFERENCE_LEVEL
columns.description: Used to get preference level of location resource group for Appointment scheduling
